subject: No haptic motors
description_text:
I received my order today and there were no haptic motors. I paid the $115 extra for the motors, brackets and power supply
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

conversations.body_text: Hi Bryan Scearce,    This is the tracking link for your other package.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045846032066
